name: Escape from the Ocean
description:
The taste of wind is in the air... and a storm is brewing. With the limited time you have, repair your ship and collect gold from this small archipelago. Time is of the essence!

Made for the Jump Start 48 Hour Game Jam

W - Jump

A / D - Left / Right

S - Repair

Programming - Bluebombhawk

Pixelart, Sounds - AnarchoVera
